Tikus Tales

Description

Tikus Tales is a playful isometric 3D platformer from Brunei featuring two heroic mice that must outwit rebellious animals and restore balance to the Chinese Zodiac.

History

Game was conceptualized back in 2020, the Year of the Mouse in the Chinese calendar.

Features

  • Cute and small but mighty protagonists.
  • Quick paced combat - Swiftly dispatch of enemies by whacking them with your hammer.
  • Boss fights - Take on the Rebels and show them size doesn't matter.
  • Optional 2P mode - It’s always more fun when you play with a buddy.
  • Cosmetic hats - Visit your wardrobe and change up your look.

About WilKGames

About Us
WilKGames is a Brunei-based independent game development studio and creative initiative founded in 2021.Rooted in a passion for playful storytelling and community empowerment, WilKGames creates unique, accessible games that celebrate local culture and embrace bold, imaginative mechanics.
More information
More information on WilKGames, our logo & relevant media are available wilkgames.
